titles.title: To require the Comptroller General of the United States to report on the country of origin of end items and components procured by the Department of Defense, and for other purposes.
To require the Comptroller General of the United States to report on the country of origin of end items and components procured by the Department of Defense, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.

bill.summary: This bill requires the Government Accountability Office to study the degree to which the Department of Defense is dependent on entities located in foreign countries for the procurement of end items (i.e., final products when assembled or completed and ready for issue, delivery, or deployment) and components (i.e., parts of end items or other components).
